name: Pussy Kingdom: Queen of Passion
description:
- “My lord, the five kingdoms are in danger! They are attacked by evil creatures who will stop at nothing to attain the lands of Pussy Kingdom. Only you can stop the attack, save everyone and, of course, win the hearts of the most charming girls in the kingdom”.

Equip your hero, collect valuable trophies, take part in battles, explore the lands of kingdoms and have unforgettable pleasure spending time with hot characters…

  • Visual novel with turn based rpg elements - upgrade your main character, unlock new abilities and win battles.

  • A catching and spicy plot where the fate of Pussy Kingdom depends on your actions. Make alliances with neighboring kingdoms or fight alone against the darkness.

  • An opportunity to enjoy moments in the company of beautiful girls from all kingdoms. Hot animated content will await you at every turn.
